alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Robeson, Columbus, Florence, Dillon, eastern Darlington, inland Horry, Marion, Marlboro and northern Williamsburg Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 112 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dunbar to near Quinby to near Woods Bay State Park. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. Rainfall will be heavy with the strongest storms with amounts up to two inches and frequent lightning. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Marion, Dillon, Lake City, Mullins, Horry, Fairmont, Mccoll, Johnsonville, Latta, Pamplico, Rowland, Fair Bluff, Quinby, Lake View, Clio, Hemingway, Sellers, Rhems and Blue Brick. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 164 and 198. Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 5. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
